sub_title: Area Manager Caspian & Black Sea @ Van Oord
summary: I am proud of my legacy at several large companies. My background in Oil & Gas, Civil and Water Industry is my foundation to represent one of the world leading Offshore and Dredging Company, Van Oord. With my Engineering and Commercial background I am mitigating operational and financial risks and creating opportunities. With only one purpose : to exceed clients expectations.
